ScrollView.Label: About the Conference
PHPBenelux is a non-profit usergroup for PHP developers in the Benelux and surrounding area. We organise monthly user group meetings, theme events and an annual conference.

The conference and tutorials will take place at Hotel Ter Elst in Antwerp (Belgium). Friday morning January 24th we have a set of tutorials. The conference is spread over 2 days: Friday afternoon (after the tutorials) and Saturday. Tutorials as well as the conference itself are spread over several parallel tracks.

Michelangelo van Dam
